actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Government Operations.

official_title: Concurrent resolution to provide an opportunity for an orderly and cohesive policy toward inflation and economic stability by declaring a 36-month moratorium on all foreign aid appropriations.

summary.text: Provides a thirty-six month moratorium on all foreign aid appropriations.

titles.title: Concurrent resolution to provide an opportunity for an orderly and cohesive policy toward inflation and economic stability by declaring a 36-month moratorium on all foreign aid appropriations.
